data.message: Fuck you M&M your a disgrace to your nation. Keep up the BS and keep loosing fans. Basic ass. All yall liberal Hollywood fucktards desecrating the nation that famed you are nothing but privileged pussies pandering to millennials trying to sell albums. You're a sell out Marshall Mathers.#FuckEminem

replies.message: So....in other words...FREEDOM, BITCH! In America we can write, record, listen to, or sell any music we want!
He not losing fans, he's always spoken his mind, if people don't it like they should get eff off his page!! It's that simple for those offended sissies.
You're a disgrace to the English language with spelling and grammar like that.
Silvester Godfatherr Garcia they still have the freedom to stay and be salty if they want.
Why are you surprised hes dissing trump? He dissed Bush too

Is Eminem also saying fuck 50cent for having Trump on G-Unit Radio? No. Why? Because he's a sellout. #FuckEminem

http://djbooth.net/mobile/feature-amp/2015-12-03-donald-trump-g-unit-shade-45
He doesn't have to dislike someone for who they support. He just dislikes the figure they are supporting. What a tiny perspective you must have.
But it's ok for you to speak your mind?
Fuck and you brain Reynolds🖕you bitch eminemi for rap foreven king anderstand you stubit shitt🖕👈🏻👉🏻👊🏻

That must make you a regular freaking Saint then huh, Caroline Webster? If you ask me it's people like you that are a big part of the problem with what's wrong with our world. But hey, good thing we have the freaking grammar and spelling police on here to talk down on people. You ever maybe stop to think that maybe some people didn't get a great education or couldn't afford to go to college, or hell, even be in a position to go to school? I'll answer for you, no it probably didn't even cross your mind to think about that. That's what's wrong with our freaking country.

Lol gotta love these real sellouts who sold out the country in order not to admit a person of color became their president for almost a decade and all they did was hate and whine  like little bitches, as if a white guy in the office would of really been fighting for them and not the big businesses that actually control this country. Idiots.

Eminem is a music icon your a
